titleStmt.title: The world to come, or The mysterie of the resurrection opened: in a discourse at Burford in the county of Oxon, upon Acts 24.15. / By John Osborn, minister of the Gospel at Bampton in the bush. As also, in a conference between him and Richard Coppin of Westwell.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, John, lover of the truth as it is in Jesus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Moxon, and are to be sold by Henry Hood, at his shop in S. Dunstans Churchyard, in Fleetstreet. MDCLI. [1651]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstans Churchyard, in Fleetstreet. MDCLI. [1651]
